channel.title: The Bad Guys 2 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Bad Guys 2 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Bad Guys 2’ Review: Sam Rockwell’s Mr. Wolf Leads His Fellow Animal Scoundrels in a Benignly Rambunctious Follow-Up
item.description: “The Bad Guys 2” turns into a visually elegant outer-space action adventure, and that’s where the film really comes alive.
